home.title: Home - Web Agency & Digital Solutions
home.description: OOZAMI, your digital partner in Tournai. We create high-performance websites, innovative designs and custom digital strategies to grow your business.

services.title: Our Services - Web Development, Design & Marketing
services.description: Discover our comprehensive digital services: website creation, mobile applications, UX/UI design, SEO, digital marketing and Sitecore integration.

about.title: About - Our Digital Expertise
about.description: OOZAMI combines creativity and technology to transform your ideas into high-performance digital solutions. Discover our approach and our passionate team.

contact.title: Contact - Let's Talk About Your Project
contact.description: Contact OOZAMI to discuss your digital project. Based in Tournai, we support Belgian and international companies in their digital transformation.

dashboard.description: Explore our analytics dashboard with real-time data, intelligent personalization and insights based on Sitecore Experience Platform.
